thread.title: BREAKING: Fire raging on Dubai's Sheikh Zayed Road
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Fire raging on Dubai's Sheikh Zayed Road

title: BREAKING: Fire raging on Dubai's Sheikh Zayed Road
text: (Neeraj Murali) Developing story: Khaleej Times brings you live updates A fire has broken out on Dubai's Sheikh Zayed Road, behind Sidra Tower/Fraser Suite, past Mall of the Emirates heading towards Abu Dhabi. Firefighters immediately arrived at the site and are battling the blaze. - Khaleej Times (@khaleejtimes) February 18, 2017 According to initial reports the fire broke out in a construction office on Umm Suqeim Road. Traffic on both directions have not been affected. Residents took to Twitter to post pictures of the fire. Fire in Dubai next to.. Gloria Hotel? Can't tell from here. pic.twitter.com/QTTWiPNdnF
